description: Gets the current value for one or more asset properties. For more information, see Querying current values in the IoT SiteWise User Guide.

parameters.name: entries
parameters.description: The list of asset property value entries for the batch get request. You can specify up to 128 entries per request. (dict) --- Contains information for an asset property value entry that is associated with the BatchGetAssetPropertyValue API. To identify an asset property, you must specify one of the following: The assetId and propertyId of an asset property. A propertyAlias, which is a data stream alias (for example, /company/windfarm/3/turbine/7/temperature). To define an asset property's alias, see UpdateAssetProperty. The ID of the entry. assetId (string) --- The ID of the asset in which the asset property was created. propertyId (string) --- The ID of the asset property, in UUID format. propertyAlias (string) --- The alias that identifies the property, such as an OPC-UA server data stream path (for example, /company/windfarm/3/turbine/7/temperature). For more information, see Mapping industrial data streams to asset properties in the IoT SiteWise User Guide.

nested_items.name: errorEntries
nested_items.description: A list of the errors (if any) associated with the batch request. Each error entry contains the entryId of the entry that failed.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The error code.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The associated error message.

nested_items.name: entryId
nested_items.description: The ID of the entry.

nested_items.name: successEntries
nested_items.description: A list of entries that were processed successfully by this batch request. Each success entry contains the entryId of the entry that succeeded and the latest query result.

nested_items.name: entryId
nested_items.description: The ID of the entry.

nested_items.name: assetPropertyValue
nested_items.description: Contains asset property value information.

nested_items.name: stringValue
nested_items.description: Asset property data of type string (sequence of characters). The allowed pattern: '^$|[^u0000-u001Fu007F]+'. The max length is 1024.

nested_items.name: integerValue
nested_items.description: Asset property data of type integer (whole number).

nested_items.name: doubleValue
nested_items.description: Asset property data of type double (floating point number). The min value is -10^10. The max value is 10^10. Double.NaN is allowed.

nested_items.name: booleanValue
nested_items.description: Asset property data of type Boolean (true or false).

nested_items.name: nullValue
nested_items.description: The type of null asset property data with BAD and UNCERTAIN qualities.

nested_items.name: valueType
nested_items.description: The type of null asset property data.

nested_items.name: timestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the asset property value.

nested_items.name: timeInSeconds
nested_items.description: The timestamp date, in seconds, in the Unix epoch format. Fractional nanosecond data is provided by offsetInNanos.

nested_items.name: offsetInNanos
nested_items.description: The nanosecond offset from timeInSeconds.

nested_items.name: quality
nested_items.description: The quality of the asset property value.

nested_items.name: skippedEntries
nested_items.description: A list of entries that were not processed by this batch request. because these entries had been completely processed by previous paginated requests. Each skipped entry contains the entryId of the entry that skipped.

nested_items.name: entryId
nested_items.description: The ID of the entry.

nested_items.name: completionStatus
nested_items.description: The completion status of each entry that is associated with the BatchGetAssetPropertyValue request.

nested_items.name: errorInfo
nested_items.description: The error information, such as the error code and the timestamp.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The error code.

nested_items.name: errorTimestamp
nested_items.description: The date the error occurred, in Unix epoch time.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results, or null if there are no additional results.
